appearance.description: The appearance of all the toggle buttons within the group.

defaultValue.description: The default value. Use when the component is not controlled.

disabled.description: If `true`, the Toggle Button Group will be disabled.

value.description: Value of the toggle button group, to be used when the component is controlled.

onChange.description: Callback fired when the selection changes.

readOnly.description: If `true`, the toggle button group will be read-only.

orientation.description: The orientation of the toggle buttons.

sentiment.description: The visual sentimenent of all the toggle buttons within the group.
